termsPage.generalInformationText: These Terms describe the terms and conditions applicable to your access and use of the website, located at _______, and its sub-domains (the “Website”). Use of the services is subject to these Terms and any other rules or policies published on the Website or otherwise made available to you by «Mova». You understand that by creating an account on the «Mova», you enter into a legally binding contract with «Mova»  with effect from this date and indicate your unconditional acceptance of these Terms. As a User or a visitor of the «Mova», the collection, use, and sharing of your personal data are subject to the Privacy Policy, as may be amended from time to time.
termsPage.tutorTermsText1: You may access and use the «Mova» as:
termsPage.tutorTermsText2: a registered user seeking online language teaching and tutoring services by using the Tutor (the 'Student');
termsPage.tutorTermsText3: a registered user providing online language teaching and tutoring services via «Mova»  (the 'Tutor');
termsPage.tutorTermsText5: Throughout these Terms, 'you' or 'your' may refer as applicable to the Student, the Tutor, or a visitor accessing or using any of our Services (each the 'User').
termsPage.tutorTermsText6: Tutor services include access to the «Mova»  for Students and Tutors, to connect for online language teaching and tutoring services, facilitation of payments between Students and Tutors, and customer support and related services (the 'Services'). «Mova»  does not provide language teaching and tutoring services.
termsPage.tutorTermsText7: All available teaching and tutoring services on the «Mova»  are provided according to the services' specific terms outlined in the Legal Center. You are responsible for obtaining and paying for any equipment and Internet service necessary to access the Services. We may alter, suspend, or discontinue the «Mova»  or the Services in whole or in part, at any time and for any reason, without notice. The «Mova»  may also become unavailable periodically due to maintenance or malfunction of computer equipment or other reasons. You acknowledge that the «Mova»  Platform is evolving and that the form and nature of the Services may change from time to time without notice to you.
termsPage.tutorTermsText8: «Mova»  does not endorse or make any representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of any information provided by the «Mova»  within the verification procedure. Tutor cannot confirm that each User is who they claim to be. You agree and understand that you assume all risks when using the Services, including without limitation any and all of the risks associated with any online or offline interactions with other Users. When interacting with other Users, you should exercise caution and common sense to protect your personal safety and property, just as you would when interacting with other people you don’t know. Neither «Mova» nor its affiliates or licensors is responsible for the conduct, whether online or offline, of any User of the Services. «Mova», its affiliates, and licensors will not be liable for any claim, injury, or damage arising from or in connection with your use of the Services.
termsPage.tutorTermsText10: The Tutor service is allowed to be used from the age of 18, or up to 18, but under the supervision of an adult user.
termsPage.amendmentTermsText1: We reserve the right to amend or modify Terms at any time, by posting a revised version on the Website and by notifying you through the «Mova», or via the email address associated with you in case of material change hereto. The latest version is published on this page.
termsPage.amendmentTermsText2: We encourage you to check this page regularly. If you do not agree with the amendments to these Terms, you have the right to terminate these Terms by discontinuing your use of the Services and providing a termination notice to «Mova»  or deleting your account. By continuing to use the Services following the amendment of these Terms, you consent to be bound by the Terms as amended.
termsPage.useTutorText1: In case you are a Student, «Mova»  hereby grants you, on the Terms set forth herein, a nontransferable, non-sublicensable, non-exclusive, limited right to access and use the «Mova»  solely for your non-commercial personal use.
termsPage.useTutorText2: In case you are a Tutor, «Mova»  hereby grants you, on the Terms set forth herein, a nontransferable, non-sublicensable, non-exclusive, limited right to access and use the «Mova»  solely for the provision of the tutoring services to the Students.
termsPage.useTutorText3: You agree not to view, copy, or procure content or information from the Tutor by automated means (such as scripts, bots, spiders, crawlers, or scrapers), or to use other data mining technology or processes to frame, mask, extract data or other materials from the Tutor (except as may be a result of the standard search engine or Internet browser usage) unless formally authorized by Tutor under separate written agreement. You agree not to inquire about the engagement of or to engage Tutors to complete assignments, write papers, take quizzes, or otherwise do work on your behalf. Further, you agree not to use the Services for any purpose that violates the academic honesty policy or other conduct policies of your school, university, academic institution, or workplace. You may not share or transfer your account credentials with any third party.You agree not to view, copy, or procure content or information from the «Mova»  by automated means (such as scripts, bots, spiders, crawlers, or scrapers), or to use other data mining technology or processes to frame, mask, extract data or other materials from the «Mova»  (except as may be a result of the standard search engine or Internet browser usage) unless formally authorized by «Mova»  under separate written agreement. You agree not to inquire about the engagement of or to engage Tutors to complete assignments, write papers, take quizzes, or otherwise do work on your behalf. Further, you agree not to use the Services for any purpose that violates the academic honesty policy or other conduct policies of your school, university, academic institution, or workplace. You may not share or transfer your account credentials with any third party.
termsPage.directInteractionText1: «Mova»  does not take part in direct interactions between Students and Tutors except when we consider it advisable:
termsPage.directInteractionText2: to ensure compliance with these Terms;
termsPage.directInteractionText4: «Mova» does not have control over the services provided by the Tutors, any reviews or ratings provided by the Students, or any User acts and omission.
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText1: you will provide the tutoring services in accordance with these Terms and other policies set forth by «Mova»  and made available to you via email or by posting on the Website;
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText2: you will provide the tutoring services in accordance with laws and regulations applicable in the state or country where you are providing the tutoring services;
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText3: you are solely responsible and fully liable for any violation of any local laws and regulations that apply to your provision of the tutoring services;
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText4: you will provide the tutoring services with reasonable care and skill and in accordance with generally recognized practices;
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText5: you have obtained all registrations, certifications, licenses, and other documentation that are required in the applicable jurisdiction for providing the tutoring services. It is your obligation to maintain the validity of all aforementioned documentation;
termsPage.tutorRepresentationsText6: you will not provide tutoring services to the Students outside of the «Mova», receive payments from the Students directly, or encourage or solicit payment from the Student directly or through any channels other than those provided by «Mova»;
termsPage.studentRepresentationsText1: If you use the Services as a Student:
termsPage.studentRepresentationsText2: you agree to honor the commitments you make to the Tutor via the «Mova»  Platform;
termsPage.studentRepresentationsText3: you agree that you will not circumvent or manipulate the fee structure, the billing process, or fees owed to the «Mova»;
termsPage.studentRepresentationsText4: and you agree to use good faith efforts to interact with the Tutors.
termsPage.studentRepresentationsText5: if you did not attend the lesson, without canceling it in advance, the funds are debited from your account in favor of the tutor.
termsPage.paymentsAndReturnsStudentText1: third-party payment processors charge a fee for each transaction.  Transaction fees are deducted from the corresponding amount and paid by users;
termsPage.paymentsAndReturnsStudentText2: if the user wishes to return unused funds, it is carried out within no more than 7 working days.
termsPage.paymentsAndReturnsTeacherText1: Tutors get payments for rendered services (lessons) to students is carried out within no more than 7 working days, less the remuneration of the Tutor service in the amount of 10% of the amount.

policyPage.generalInformationPolicy: Please read that privacy Policy carefully. That privacy policy are not negotiable. If you do not agree to it, you must stop using «Mova»  immediately. Access to the «Mova» is available with or without the necessity to register an account. You may access our Website without registration. However, whenever you access the Website, we collect log information and put cookies on your device, by which we track your activity on the Website. You can always opt out of cookies except those without which the Website cannot work. When you are a registered user, «Mova» may collect from you and process cookie identifiers and the data you specifically provide us with upon registration, including first name, last name, email, phone number, or social network ID      (if assigned through Facebook, Twitter or Google, time zone, interface language, IP address, and device type. Specifically, if you are a tutor, we may also collect and process, besides the aforementioned information, the other data provided by you, including, city of residence, and education experience. Registered users may additionally provide profile pictures as well as chosen currency to perform actions pursuant. We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time, so please check this page to ensure that you’re happy with any changes. We will post those changes on this page and update the Privacy Policy. Any questions regarding this Policy and our services should be sent to asktutor24@gmail.com.
policyPage.basesProcessingText1: «Mova»  processes your personal data only when we have bases. Specifically, «Mova» processes your personal data if:
policyPage.basesProcessingText2: processing is based on the consent you have given. As such our newsletters, collection, analysis, and publication of user feedback and reviews, placement of different types of cookies;
policyPage.basesProcessingText3: processing is necessary to provide our services to you;
policyPage.basesProcessingText4: processing is necessary for the purposes of our interests.
policyPage.basesProcessingText5: Those legitimate interests may include but are not limited to: - compliance with the U.S. financial and accounting legislation;
policyPage.basesProcessingText6: user session control and fraud prevention, ensuring the appropriate protection of personal data;
policyPage.basesProcessingText7: enhancing the learning experience for tutors and students by providing recommendations, improved lesson planning, and interactive learning tools;
policyPage.basesProcessingText8: in exceptional cases, to protect your vital interests or vital interests of another natural person; or for the performance of a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in us;
policyPage.basesProcessingText9: in all cases, we will notify you about the applied legal basis for processing and other relevant details before we start the processing of your personal data on a specific legal basis unless we are not able to do so in accordance with our obligations under any applicable legislation.
policyPage.registrationAndAccountsText1: Any Browser can view «Mova», but in order to participate fully in all activities on «Mova», it must register for a personal account on «Mova»  by providing a name, an email address and a password.
policyPage.registrationAndAccountsText2: you agree that you will never divulge or share access or your access information to your User Account with any third party for any reason whatsoever;
policyPage.registrationAndAccountsText3: in setting up your User Account, you may be prompted or required to enter anyadditional information, that will help other Users get to know you and help us to tailor the services to suit you and comply with our legal obligations;
policyPage.registrationAndAccountsText4: you undertake to us that all information provided by you in relation to your User Account is and will continue to be accurate, current and complete at all times and that you will maintain and update your information to keep it accurate, current and complete.
policyPage.accountStudentText: «Mova»  collects and processes personal data submitted by you upon registration and further editing of settings in your Account. For registration purposes, you submit your login credentials (username and password), first name, last name, and email. You may also edit your Account anytime with additional information.
policyPage.accountTutorText: «Mova»  collects and processes personal data submitted by you upon registration and further editing of your profile. For registration purposes, you submit your login credentials (username and password), first name, last name, and email. You may also edit your profile anytime with additional information. At the same time, you are not strictly required to provide additional information not specifically necessary for the registration. Therefore, it is your choice whether to include additional data in your profile, or not, such as, country, language skills, education, and other.
policyPage.registrationAccText1: We process personal data freely submitted to you on «Mova». This may be an online form you fill in on «Mova», a question or comment left in the Q&A section of our Website, or feedback you provide us with.
policyPage.registrationAccText2: «Mova»  may also process information provided by you (including content and messages) that you post on/through the «Mova», including personally identifiable information. By doing so, you acknowledge that any information you share through the services will be available to «Mova»  and to other users of the services.
policyPage.registrationAccText3: From our turn and unless you opt out, we retain this information as necessary to resolve disputes, provide customer support and troubleshoot problems as permitted by law. We reserve the right to terminate the accounts of visitors who use these services in a manner inconsistent with the terms of use.
